mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_tokens (user_id, user_type, username, token, expiration_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userType}, #{username}, #{token}, #{expirationDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM email_tokens WHERE user_type = #{userType} AND user_name = #{username} AND token = #{token}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM email_tokens WHERE expiration_date < NOW()
